projects.title: Microservices E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A scalable e-commerce backend system built with microservices architecture, handling product catalog, user management, order processing, and payment integration.

diagram.definition:
graph TB
    A[Client] --> B[API Gateway]
    B --> C[Auth Service]
    B --> D[Product Service]
    B --> E[Order Service]
    B --> F[Payment Service]
    D --> G[(Product DB)]
    E --> H[(Order DB)]
    F --> I[(Payment DB)]
    C --> J[(User DB)]
    D --> K[Cache Layer]
    E --> K
    K --> L[(Redis)]
    M[Message Queue] --> E
    M --> F

projects.details: Designed and implemented a microservices-based e-commerce platform with API Gateway pattern. Services communicate via REST APIs and message queues. Implemented caching layer for improved performance and scalability.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard Backend
projects.description: Backend system for processing and aggregating real-time analytics data from multiple sources, providing RESTful APIs for dashboard visualization.

diagram.definition:
flowchart LR
    A[Data Sources] --> B[Kafka Stream]
    B --> C[Data Processor]
    C --> D[Data Aggregator]
    D --> E[(MongoDB)]
    D --> F[(Elasticsearch)]
    G[API Server] --> E
    G --> F
    G --> H[Client Dashboard]
    I[Cache Layer] --> G

projects.details: Built a real-time analytics processing system that ingests data from multiple sources via Kafka, processes and aggregates it, and stores in both MongoDB and Elasticsearch for different query patterns. RESTful API serves processed data to frontend dashboard.

projects.title: User Authentication & Authorization Service
projects.description: Centralized authentication and authorization service supporting OAuth2, JWT tokens, and role-based access control (RBAC).

diagram.definition:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant Auth Service
    participant User DB
    participant Token Cache
    participant Protected Service
    
    Client->>Auth Service: Login Request
    Auth Service->>User DB: Validate Credentials
    User DB-->>Auth Service: User Data
    Auth Service->>Token Cache: Store Refresh Token
    Auth Service-->>Client: Access Token + Refresh Token
    
    Client->>Protected Service: API Request + Token
    Protected Service->>Auth Service: Validate Token
    Auth Service-->>Protected Service: Token Valid
    Protected Service-->>Client: Protected Resource

projects.details: Developed a comprehensive authentication service handling user login, token generation, refresh token management, and token validation. Integrated with multiple services for centralized authentication.
